generic script class :param name: name of script :param threading: if script is excecuted on thread, default is False

dict¶

returns the configuration of the script as a dictionary that contains {‘parameters’: parameters, ‘instrument_tests’:instrument_tests, ‘scripts’: scripts} :return: nested dictionary with entries name and value

executes scripts and stores script parameters and settings :param script_function: script that :type script_function: required :param name: name of script, if not provided take name of function :type name: optinal :param settings: a Parameter object that contains all the information needed in the script
